bgm.name: Welcome to A Town of Craftsmen

parameters: Tent city has the lowest prices this
What can I do for you?
This is Tent City. We offer some
hospitality for travellers, but we mostly
serve the workers mining the mountain.
It used to be we had a long, hard hike
up the mountain to get to the castle town
of Andante, but thanks to these workers,
we can now cut through the mountain.
Please be careful if you visit the
mountain pass though. I've heard there are
dangerous monsters that have been found
Not a problem. Come back to visit us!

What can I do for you?
Hi there! Do you like math puzzles?
Great to hear! If you can solve my puzzle,
I'll give you a small prize!
If I have a 5 on the top of my time
signature, how many half notes could fit
You can sell those at stores for gold.
How many quarter rests can fit in a
measure with a 3 in the top of the time
You can sell those at stores for gold.
How many whole notes can fit in a measure
You can sell those at stores for gold.
